title: Relish The Experience of Biking With Bike Tour Packages (aspen adventures)
text: By aspen adventures Sep 26, 2015 India is land of diversity and in every part one can encounter something worth and marvelous. One part of India was unexplored since ages but with the advancement of time and technology this part of India too is getting exposure and that is Ladakh.Know About Ladakh Region:This region is in the heaven of India that is Kashmir. Ladakh is the best explored with the bikes and that's the reason you get the Ladakh Bike Tour Packages. The history indicates that human existence in this region is from the time of Neolithic period. Many monasteries and other historical sites are found in this region. Talking about the culture of Ladakh, it is pre dominantly.The Broad Outline of Services Provided by Ladakh Bike Tour Packages:Broadly, every tour package includes an itinerary of ten days and the trip starts from Manali. Mind, the bike trips are not for whole year, they are for just four months in summers as for the rest of year the region is covered with the snow. The trips start from Manali and ends at Pangonglake. During the tour the traveler will get the chance to have a day stop in the Leh city and know the culture from near. Services Included in The Bike Tour Packages:To be precise, every tour package has its own policies and services but on the broader part, they provide with the following services:1.Accommodation facilities including hotels, guest house and the tent facilities at every point of campaign. 2.Breakfast and the dinner facility.3.Oxygen cylinders are always there for help in case of emergencies. 4.Helmets are provided by the tour packages. 5.First Aid kits too are made available. 6.Emergency petrol to cope with the empty tanks. 7.Most importantly 350cc royal Enfield. An Ultimate Guide to Have The Best Ladakh Bike Tour Packages: There are many travelling services providing the facilities, it is on you which one you choose. But, it is necessary that you select the right one as that will help you to cut out on your cost. Know what will be the best according to your budget; you can also book Ladakh Bike Tour Packages online as that will save you from unnecessary hustle and bustle. Also, it is necessary that you take the advice from the tour guides of do's and don't's. Ladakh is wonderful place and this is one place which is a must destination for the adventure geeks. Though, you can enjoy by directly going to the Leh but the trip is more interesting and memorable if you take the trip with the group of bikers to Ladakh and enjoy the real Leh - ladakh trip.
